additional-class-names.name: Additional Prepared Caster class names
additional-class-names.hint: Add any extra class names you want to use for the sheet spellbook preparation functionality. Note: these should be the proper title case names as they appear in the box.

edit-class-names-menu.name: Edit class names
edit-class-names-menu.label: Edit
edit-class-names-menu.title: Edit Class Names
edit-class-names-menu.note: Add any extra class names you want to use for the sheet spellbook preparation functionality. Note: these should be the proper title case names as they appear in the box.

show-prep-limit-number.name: Show preparation limit
show-prep-limit-number.hint: Untick this if you don't want to see the Prepared Spells Limit (P. Limit) in the Spellcasting box at the top of the spells tab. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

show-prep-limit-colours.name: Change colours for preparable spells
show-prep-limit-colours.hint: Untick this if you don't want the useable spell backgrounds and preparation icons in the spells tab to change colour when you reach or exceed your limit. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

use-class-sources.name: Use class sources
use-class-sources.hint: Untick this if you don't want to manage spells for preparation spellcasters. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.
